name: Jennifer Huckeby
text: We absolutely loved every bit of it. It was really good. I Loved the Gospel Music the most. They were playing my most favorite music. I am so glad to be in a place that is not afraid to play Gospel Music out in public instead of just in Church.

name: Neil Greathouse
text: The pizza is plentiful and the buffet is super fresh. The pizza was a little ‚Äúnormal‚Äù and I was hoping for more options than some of the plain pepperoni, cheese, etc. The staff is friendly and they have a Monday all you can eat for $5 option.

name: Jane Reynolds
text:
We ate here at 2pm the buffet was still well stocked and the fried chicken was hot and crispy, very good !  Pizza was warm but dried out, not good.
Employees are great!!!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Haley Smith
text: Great deals on Tuesday with kids eat free and you can also use a coupon which makes it perfect for larger family‚Äôs. The fried chicken is really good if it is fresh, we did have to wait a while for them to put fresh chicken out but it was ‚Ä¶More

name: Raymond Selken
text: First time in. Heard good reviews by friends. Pleasantly surprised by the lunch buffet variety they had. Bunch of pizza's, fried chicken, taters and gravy, green beans and corn. Had rolls and a salad bar too. Dessert pizza's and ice cream topped it all off. Will be back again.

name: Jessica Rodriguez
text: It was amazing it has three types of crust Wich is nice most places only have thin ...I don't like thin but the kids do... It's a buffet is also has amazing fried chicken mashed potatoes green beans a full salad bar cold pasta hot pasta ‚Ä¶More

name: Travis Moneagle
text: Best pizza in USA. The wife and I thought we missed Cici pizza hah! Pizza Ranch has our business when it comes to eating out and want a variety of food. This is definitely the first place that comes to mind every time. ü§ò

name: Jp Tyra
text: Pretty good food, but the server was phenomenal. She was fast, curteous and extremely attentive. She deserves a raise.

name: JONATHAN BURROUGHS
text: Pizza Ranch is a name that does not represent this establishment! They only had 9 different pizzas when we ate here, and most of them were single topping pizzas! On top of that, they were all about the same. The only good thing about this ‚Ä¶More

name: T. Bunting
text: The chicken was very good. Nice crispy breading and very juicy. The pizza was good, but I don't think it's worth the money they charge. I was disappointed they didn't keep a good flow of popular pizzas like pepperoni on the buffet line. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Fare
text: Nice staff. Food was good. (Stuffing tasted good, but like stove top) Dessert pizza was good. Decently priced. üòä Kids eat free on Tuesday so from now on we will make that our Tuesday dinner spot.

name: joe fitts
text: Fried Chicken is really good. Pizza is average. Salad bar is good and the ranch is really good. Good folks work there. Nice environment.

name: Chad Hum
text: Food was excellent and the salad bar was as one of the best I had

name: Chris King
text: Love this place. Staff is always friendly and ready to help. I try to go at least once a week.

name: Ring Falcon Gaming
text: Really good pizza joint. Just wish they had a wider selection. Had the same things both times I went.

name: Amanda
text: Miss the potato wedges pizza ranch had in Wisconsin but friendly staff and good food

name: Geichy Girl
text: This place has amazing chicken! The staff is great, kind, and patient. Every time that we come back in town, we make a trip to Pizza Ranch.

name: Trish Maxwell
text: The atmosphere is great, the workers were nice and respectful, and the restaurant was very clean; however the pizza itself wasn't worth the visit. The regular dinner pizza just wasn't that great and the dissert pizza wasn't edible (it was ‚Ä¶More

name: James
text: Absolutley love this place. Awesome pizza. Stuffed crust on buffet. They will make any pizza you want. Also have great chicken & other country home style food.

name: Emily Cahanin
text: This place has the best fried chicken I have eaten in town. The bacon mac and cheese pizza was my family's favorite, but the real Rockstar of our first time experience was Tamee. She was beyond amazing! She was on top of the service, and made our experience the absolute best. Loved the food and the people!

name: Lynda Metz
text: I REALLY wanted to like this place. It was clean and the buffet was handled very safely. The staff members were so sweet! But the food was so awful! I don't know why they call it "Pizza Ranch" when it is really just a few slices of pizza on a buffet.

name: Amanda McKinney
text: We had a great birthday party for my husband this week at Pizza Ranch. Everyone loved it! The food was good, they kept the buffet  stocked for us. If there was anything extra we found that we wanted they gladly made it for us. The staff was ‚Ä¶More

name: Lesa Turner
text: It is really nice and clean and safe and the people are so nice they are really helpfull

name: Patricia Skaggs
text: Some days it is good but some days it just not measure up. I have had better. The macaroni salad was great. I make 95% better dressing. I can't  tolerate so much salt as the dressing always seems to have and we know that much salt is NOT good for our health.

name: Travis
text: Super family friendly and gosh the food is amazing ü§ò

name: Tennille Thomas
text: I'm not a fan of the pizza but MAN they have some GOOD fried chicken (the potato wedges are also the bomb)! Their website is very easy to use and also gives you the option to choose a pick up time. They have specials and a reward system. Did I mention the fried chicken?

name: James Fare
text: Food was great!! Staff was amazing and the price wasn't bad at all!!

name: Jaime Leigh Art
text: Surprisingly amazing! We have never heard of this place before today. On the drive from Little Rock back to Fort Smith we needed a place where 2 adults and 3 teenagers could all eat happily and boy did this fit the bill. The restaurant was ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber Davis
text: Fresh pizza. You can request any pizza and they make it! Friendly staff!

name: Joshua
text: Really nice waitress good food nice people .

name: Carol Lynn
text: It was pretty good but $26.00 for 2 people is a little pricey. After all it's pizza, nothing spectacular! üôÇ

name: Kimberly Lee
text: Right now because of the pandemic all restaurants are changing the way they handle the customers and this has been the best experience thus far! They are working really hard to take care of everyone. The food was fresh and delicious!

name: Magdalene Robinson
text: Best place to eat

name: Jeff Prather
text: Loved everything I ate, plus the Ice cream at the end sealed the deal and didn't get acid reflux after eating it.

name: carla prowse
text: Food is good. Service could have been a little better. They seemed a little under staffed

name: Patricia Ward
text: This was some of the best food I've ever had. The pizza was amazing! If they didn't have the favor or crust you could order what you wanted for no extra charge. The ice cream was great as well the desserts.The chicken was perfectly cooked ‚Ä¶More

name: Roy Canada
text: Good food.  Doing what they can to keep the place sanitary.

name: Andrew Black
text: Great folks but why so expensive?  perhaps 10 a plate not 12 tho but otherwise a great place!

name: Amber S
text: Great pizza! They're doing a great job keeping things safe and clean!

name: S B
text: Buffet was nothing notable. The family size order of chicken fingers was a great value! Just wish they tasted better.

name: Beth McCollum
text: Great pizza and hands down the best fried chicken ever to touch my lips! Crispy skin, juicy chicken, but not greasy.

name: Glen Shaw
text: Great food & great friendly staff!!!

name: Magoo F
text: Great place to take the family. They played Christian music. Good environment and good food. Friendly staff, clean restaurant and fresh food. We left very full

name: Becky Pharr
text:
Great food and a great atmosphere ... Friendly staff !
Very clean restraunt !

name: Paula Sayers
text: Very good good.  Clean surrounds.  Someone cleared our empty plates off the table as soon as we finished them.  Bathroom was very clean and well stocked.  A little pricey but very good!!

name: Joseph t
text: The place was amazing üòç worth the hour drive in traffic to experience it. If you like Larry's pizza with crazy topping try this place out and you will never crave Larry's again. Me and my wife has claimed it as our favorite place over all. ‚Ä¶More

name: Howard Gorter
text: Best pizza in Arkansas! Very good service! Great environment!

name: Wendyl Jr Srite
text: Very good very clean the style for the on top of it social disting excellent can't wait to go back thank you

name: Rod Harrison
text: It's alright. The pizza is average, the help was great.

name: Bodan Brooks
text: This is one of my favorite restaurants. I drove 41/2 hours just to find out they were closed. I understand that it was a Sunday but many other Pizza Ranch locations were open.

name: dana howell
text: Love lt üíï

name: Kristy Shaw
text: Great people and food!

name: Damion Donovan
text: Much better than cicis

name: Will Hurst
text:
It was wonderful, A+
Soft texture with the dough that led to a pleasant bite.
Slightly undercooked leaving it nice and fluffy topped with the highest quality ingredients

name: brandimoondoll
text: Super great food and dessert. Coffee could have been stronger kinda tasted like warm water. But other than that absolutely perfect!

name: Sandra Mercer
text: Pizza is good but their chicken is some of the best!  Service was great.

name: Tom Howard
text: Love this place always the best chicken and pizza

name: Nathan Crain
text: Very disappointing. I was first a bit surprised at the price upon entering. I was thinking for the price, there would be a wide variety of offerings other than just pizza. Boy was I wrong. They do offer fried chicken and waffle fries, ‚Ä¶More

name: bula charleswilliams
text: Covid19 has it kinda screwed up they have to make ur plates and get ur drinks still a Buffet but they don't put your food the way you would if you made your own plate at a all-you-can-eat buffet

name: George Mayo
text: Fabulous fried chicken like my grandmother used to prepare. Good pizza, drink and salad bar. Extremely nice service staff that goes the extra mile.

name: Shannon Guill
text: Very polite, clean, good prices and very good food!

name: Terry Weir
text: Very friendly efficient staff.  Dining room and restrooms were very clean. Food was hot and very tasty, would not hesitate to stop here again when in area. Traveling  with a 5th wheel, sufficient parking and easy access.

name: AR Girl Scout
text: Great tasting food!  Great selection of food.  Stopped by with a group of 42 Girl Scouts (we called ahead) and the service was great.  Their chicken is real good.   Will stop by again if in the area.

name: David Speich
text: Good hot food. Not as many chicken legs on buffet, if you like thighs you would be in hog heaven. Pardon the pun.

name: Kristy Caswell
text: Excellent food and atmosphere.  What more can you ask for all you can eat fried chicken and pizza.  Our waitress Tamee was excellent very friendly and good attitude.

name: Micheal Murray
text: The food quality was great and customer service welcoming. Atmosphere wise it was very settling. Christian based music played in the background but it was subtle, you hardly noticed. All in all it was a good place to eat at a buffet with its wide range of choices, despite me not having an appetite.

name: Cindy Frye
text: Tamee definitely made our visit enjoyable! The food was excellent but her customer service was amazing! Me and my boys stopped in for lunch today and Tamee had such a bubbly personality and interacted With the guests in such a positive way. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sir Alex
text: The chicken is amazing. Everything was fresh, and it was a really good meal. Unlike other buffet places, the drink is included in the price of the meal.

name: Tish G
text: Great fried chicken and small salad bar, pizza is fair but you can special order for no extra cost. Very crowded at lunch usually. Overall a good place for the whole family.

name: thom raup
text: Great food, especially the chicken !!

name: Janice Pope
text: I love their Chicken!!!!. We order to go. They cook it fresh every time. It's so worth waiting for.

name: Lisa Barrett
text: Great customer service. Amazing food. Great selection. Very clean. First time coming here. DEFINITELY NOT MY LAST!

name: Bradley Stogsdill
text: Nice for a change.. sort of a cross between pizza hut and Frank's cafeteria.. buffet style.  I personally did not care a whole lot for the pizza selections. You got cheese or pepperoni or buffalo wings pizza. No traditional pizza selections where offered. The fried chicken was good and the sides were ok for buffet style food.

name: LOIS BOWIE
text: For a buffet food and service is good you can go there three different days and three different types of meals download before you go build points and get money off on your next meal

name: G. Anderson
text: Not a big pizza fan but the husband is but I was impressed by all the options on the lunch buffet. I actually enjoyed the many varieties of pizza as well as the buffet of southern food such as fried chicken and mashed potatoes etc. We will definitely be back.

name: DCW
text: Great buffet style restaurant. The chicken and pizza are great.

name: Michele L. Montgomery
text: Pizza heaven. Lots of pizza. Even desert pizza. The best thing I ate was definitely the chicken fingers. Great friendly staff.

name: Rick Hukle
text: Nice place to eat. Big buffet with a lot of options and cheap.  Great salad Bar too.  We will be back.    Thank you Pizza Ranch.

name: Scott Havens
text: I was impressed with the buffet whrn i went in. They have very good pizza on buffet with multiple kinds. Bread sticks and desserts pizza. But they also have mashed potatoes and gravy, corn, green beans, biscuits and gravy and The Best Fried ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley McPherson
text: food is amazing but ive never felt more uncomfortable in there than i did today. there was one employee that kept just peeking around the corner at me and my boyfriend as i ate and it made us leave before i was actually done with my food. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Dean
text: Best place to eat in Conway...

name: Wesley Hudson
text: Great service, and the workers are really awesome, and kind plus the pizza can be a little less greasy but I really love the pizza, also the wings are great...........

name: kaci mccrary
text: Everything I ate was good, the pizza was thin enough to where I didn't feel like I was filling up just on bread. Everyone that worked there was super nice and smiling. The music could be a little more for "everyone", but that wouldn't stop me from going back :)

name: Andrew Mracek
text: Thier chicken and pizza rock

name: Paula Rios
text: First time I went there. It was good. Nice place good food. Maybe just a little bit to pricey. Not alot but definitely a little. I was treated to dinner there. On my budget I wouldnt say it's a place I'd go back on a night I treat myself to go out to eat but it was good. Chicken was the best. Really good chickenüòä

name: Joannie White
text: Very very good. We had 10 people in.our party. Good food, good servers. Kept tables clean and we're very attentive. .

name: Kevin Horaley
text: Love the food!  Lots of variety.  Clean restaurant, and good atmosphere.! Will go back.

name: LouAnn Brown
text: The chicken was really good, the service is very friendly a good place for family and seniors on a budget the pizzas weren't bad either I plan to go more often.

name: Anetta Tiquila Treasures
text: Omg the food is soooooo good. The chicken is some of the best I've tasted so far and the deserts hit the spot. Everything about this place is just awesome.

name: Brandi Harris
text: Amazing food and the best customer service I have had in a long time!

name: Deb Buss
text: Great place. Buffet was wonderful, with a good variety, it was kept stocked with hot food. Nothing was ever out very long

name: Jessica Grgurich
text: I was SO EXCITED to find out that there is a Pizza Ranch in Arkansas!!! This place has always been a favorite when visiting my brothers in South Dakota.. Pizza is amazing and they always make a fresh veggie/cheese pizza for my little band of vegetarians.  My mother swears by the fried chicken.  Just really good food

name: Balinda Stamm
text: Wonderful... It was our first time here and we loved everything! The food was very delicious and fresh, the waitress was friendly! In fact every employee was friendly! The price was perfect for all the food you get! We definitely will be back!! Thank you for your hard work and dedication!!

name: Jaina Richardson
text: Me personally I didn't enjoy the food to much. It was my first time visit and I heard a lot about the chicken, but to me it was salty. And the pizza just wasn't the best. Overall my experience was nice. Staff were friendly. It was crowded, so it was kinda hot in there!

name: Eurl Riley
text: Service is good .drinks comes with meal.chicken and pizza ice cream is awesome. But i suggest a new addition to the buffet to change it up a bit. So as to not get burned out..over all it's a go there.place for fams.

name: Josh B
text: Super clean, good selection on the buffet. Fried Chicken was excellent!

name: Inna McDonough
text: Great people! Wonderful chicken! Great pizza and pizza desserts, blueberry, my favorite. Request specific, no extra charge and only take the slices you want.!! Pizza or eat from bar.

name: Jeff Drabek
text: Pizza and cheese sticks are really good. But, that fried chicken is better than any other restaurant in town,  hands down ! Salad bar is fantastic. The wife and I will definitely be back.

name: Nicole Wise-Pruitt
text: About $11 for lunch. Totally worth it. That was the best buffalo chicken pizza I've ever had! It was all delicious. They have other things too like fried chicken, mashed potatoes, fries, etc. Family friendly atmosphere and tons of room for big family gatherings. I highly recommend.

name: raptor1 raptor1
text: The fried Chicken was amazing. I'm not a fan of the pizza my 8 year old liked it.

name: Ann Authier
text: Average pizza, not bad but not great either. Chicken is good but the side items are nothing to get excited about. Employees are friendly and restaurant is clean. Fine to eat at lunch or a weekday, but $13 for a weekend buffet is too much. The buffet is not worth $13.

name: Chris S
text:
Hot Dam, the Fried Chicken here!!!

Sure they've got pizza, salad, yadda yadda yadda. The fried chicken is the ‚Ä¶More

name: Larry Mckinnis
text: Absolutely love the variety of pizzas and the specialty desert pizzas are excellent, love the chicken and veggies, etc. and the fact that coffee is served is amazing

name: Cassie Pavlu
text: I am not a big fan of the non-dessert pizza combinations but I do enjoy the salad bar and southern food options. Their dessert pizza is tops! Their unique selection is what seperates them from other pizza buffets!

name: JD Henley
text: The fried Chicken was great. Service was good.

name: Tina Ann Graves
text: This place is fantastic and with a fabulous atmosphere. I highly recommend them to everyone. Love this place.

name: Amy Robins
text: Love the selection of food. Best fried chicken I have ever had. I go here every Tuesday with my husband. I have told many people about this place and many have gone and have raved about how great the food is.

name: noa no
text: You're going to be surprised by the selection. I definitely wasn't expecting a place called Pizza Ranch to have such an interesting buffet.

name: Joshua Ulery
text: Wow.  Went there on a Friday afternoon.  The pizza is not all bad, but it certainly isn't great.  The pepperoni was good, nice crispy slices and a crunchy thin crust.  The other kinds I had were bland and the cheese was just not good. ‚Ä¶More

name: Dan Sandor
text: Natalie Magie is terrific and she made my nephew and niece smile. They loved her!

name: Erik Songer
text: The fried chicken is so crispy and has a wonderful taste....the pizzas are really great and staff is super friendly.....bathrooms were very clean as well as the while restaurant.......I would recommend this place to anyone for a pizza buffet...glad to have them in Conway,Ar. 5+ stars

name: MichaelnMaria Phillips
text: Great place to eat! Loved the salad bar. If you only want salad you get cheaper. I recommend!!!!

name: Laura Newberry
text: Pizza Ranch is a Great Place to eat a GOOD COOKED & GOOD TASTING MEAL WITH OR WITHOUT YOUR FAMILY. GREAT SERVICE FROM A GREAT CREW ON FRIDAY MARCH 22 IN CONWAY,AR AT 3:45PM. AWESOME JOB GUYS....Keep up the good work. Y'all will stay around a long time doing things like they were done TODAY. Thanx for a Great time

name: Vincent Simonetta
text: Pizza Ranch provided nice rooms for any sort of party at little or no extra cost. Nice staff and food  selection

name: Shannon Davidson
text: The building was so nice and clean, even the bathrooms!! Buffet was amazing, freshly made slices of pizzas with a variety to choose from. The chicken is delicious, the waitress takes care of her tables. Definitely will be a repeat customer

name: Tessie Loveless-Williams
text: People very polite and nice food was amazing and hot

name: james Stunna
text: Very good! The girl that works in the kitchen during the day makes a darn good cheeseburger pizza!

name: Pammie Stroud
text: They make "my" pizza (Tuscan Roma), salad bar offers a good variety of veggies and chicken is excellent!

name: Amanda Dawn
text: Being called Pizza Ranch, I assumed the pizza would be the highlight of the food. While the pizza is okay, it's the fried chicken I will be returning for! Crispy, juicy, and hot. Our new go to for chicken

name: Ted Gipson
text: It was very good.

name: Jonathan Wilson
text: Selection of pizza is small but the fried chicken is amazing.

name: Abigail Esparza
text: First time here! Everything was awesome and I don‚Äôt see how they could be better! Pizza and chicken were SOO tasteful and FRESH! Service was great and even has reserved rooms for big groups. Ice cream wasn‚Äôt that great because it wasn‚Äôt ‚Äúreal‚Äù ice cream but other than that, service, food, and price was great. I totally recommend.

name: Beverly Bland
text: Husband and I enjoyed our visit.  Pizza was pretty good, chicken was also pretty good.  Their pizza desserts were the best we have ever experienced.  Like that the drinks are  included in their pricing.   Overall a pleasant experience.

name: wendy baker
text: Great salad bar.  Pizza was good

name: Pam Wheeler
text: Great food and service!  Tamee was just as awesome as the reviews I read!

name: Tina E.lee
text: Fresh food made contenusly . Great services.

name: Eric & Julie Lambert
text: A little better than Cici's but even more expensive. Not really worth the difference.

name: Lisa Phillips
text: The food was really good and fresh great salad bar.Friendly place.

name: Chad Woodard
text: Great place and FOOD love this place and the Buffet is great definitely tell others 100%

name: Keith Monton
text: Outstanding chicken.  The price is right with Veterans discount.  Great pizza.  Friendly staff.  Custom order pizza included in buffet.

name: John & Jody Carr
text: When we arrived the buffet was low on food but within a few minutes there was plenty. The staff made a pizza for us by request. Clean facility and pleasant crew.

name: Patrick deLassus
text: What a great place! We are always treated very well here. The staff makes a point to look you in the eye when talking to you. The pizza is great, ask for a cup to put marinara in. Chicken is why you go. Try a piece of cactus bread (I choose chocolate) with some ice cream. You'll thank me later.

name: Vicki Fox
text: Good variety, but they have a problem keeping the pizza line stocked, especially the dessert pizza. But it's very yummy!

name: Angela Jean
text: THE BEST PIZZA AND MORE RESTAURANT! Nice clean family type. It's roomy and comfortable. My husband and I would definitely recommend!

name: Shiquita Mack-BRETL
text: Great pizza and FRIED CHICKEN!!!

name: Giva Nash
text: Wonderful atmosphere. Buffet has salad and pizza also fried chicken, mashed potatoes, gravy, green beans, and corn. Desserts are good.

name: Susan Elliott-Copeland
text: The service today was not as it has been. The two guys up front done nothing but talk to each other instead of trying to be helpful and courteous. There was no pizza out either. Sad because I really like this place but today it sucked!

name: Taunya Kidd
text: The fried chicken was wonderful and the salad bar had lots of great options. If you don't see the pizza you want, they will make it for you.

name: Shon Killion
text: Good food good price.a little over $10 for pizza buffet and fried Chicken buffet with a drink. Not bad

name: Adrienne Kelly
text: Pizza is good but the fried chicken is GREAT!

name: Veronica Meadows
text: Okay, so my heart is just happy that Arkansas has a Pizza Ranch. I grew up in Iowa, and it was an every Friday event for my parents and I to go down the road to Pizza Ranch...and the nostalgia made this experience wonderful.

name: Brandon PuppySnax
text: One of the best restaurants I have been to in a long time. The pizza was phenomenal. It had amazing taste and texture. The deserts were even better. The crust of the deserts were perfectly moist. The soft serve machine‚Äôs ice cream was ‚Ä¶More

name: Will Moore
text: Mildly disappointed. The place had been hyped up a lot to us, and the food didn't deliver. The chicken was pretty good, but the pizza was a greasy mess, for the most part. The margherita pizza was excellent and my wife was equally impressed ‚Ä¶More

name: Levi Kennell
text:
Ok so this is a mixed review. I'll start off with the bad.
1. Last time we went out waitress just stood there playing on her phone the whole time. Refused to pick up the dirty plates from our table or re fill our ‚Ä¶More

name: Kenneth Mattox
text: If undercooked frozen pizza and unseasoned canned veggies warmed up in a microwave is your thing, go to pizza ranch. In addition you'll get plentiful instant mashed potatoes and instant " stove top" dressing and baked frozen biscuits and ‚Ä¶More

name: Heather carter
text: It was really good! The pizza and the chicken were both very tasty!! All of the sides and the salad bar were great! The restaurant was clean and the staff was very nice!

name: Thane Ojala
text: The staff was so nice and the chicken is delicious.

name: Dovia Montague
text: The salad bar and pizza was good . And they have good chicken to

name: Bethany Kay
text: Dirty plates everywhere, staff was not busy. They just stood around and talked. Got to point that one couple had to clean their own table cause every table had dirty dishes on them. Food was not appetizing, hard chicken was good but ‚Ä¶More

name: Beonca Axelson
text: The food is so good. The pizza is great but the fried chicken is AMAZING

name: Eli Dames
text: Very clean place, employees are nice folk, and the food is fresh! If you see a full parking lot, dont let that deter you. There are more than enough tables.

name: Ben Hicks
text: Very disappointing. Not in the food, I‚Äôve never been there, but my friends all decided to go to pizza ranch without me even though it‚Äôs all I had been talking about for months. So this is now my least favorite restaurant. I‚Äôll stick to shame eating my little Caesar‚Äôs In traffic, thanks

name: Bob Hambuchen
text: I love their chicken and veggies.

name: Brian austin
text: This is a top notch place to eat. Buffet style about $10 each which includes the drink. Unlimited pizza, chicken and extras, all hot and fresh. Staff is friendly and fast!

name: Lori Whitneyoghdpvykgcfkh
text: The pizza üçï and chicken üêî was good

name: Sharon Linder
text: Funny name. Great pizza. They have buffet with chicken and salad or order from the menu.  Pleasant service.

name: Bennie Harmon
text: Great food and self service place!

name: Marie Cravens
text:
Finally
A great place for Christian's to go.
Many different kinds. And a southern bar known for their fried chicken!

name: C Burton
text: The line was really long as we got there right at dinner time. The staff moved really quickly getting the line down. The dinner buffet was $11ish plus tax. Kids 2 and under are free. Kids 3-12 are $0.95+kids age. There is a pizza buffet ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Tucker
text: This is a new layout for Pizza Ranch. One straight one sided counter for customers instead of 3 island counters for the hot food & salads. The food was just as good and we will be back when we are in the area.

name: Amy Delmonte
text: Friendly people and good food

name: William Seagrave
text: Good food they had a few classic pizzas and a bunch of exotic pizzas some I tried some I will never try. Overall great atmosphere great people great food and I will go back.

name: Joy Taylor
text:
Only giving 3 stars.. the food was good and flavorful, the staff was extremely helpful and kind!
The three stars is because of price... this will ALWAYS be a factor when you're ‚Ä¶More

name: Barbara Davis
text: Best Pizza place around. The people are great. Great experience. Treated us like family. The kind you like!

name: Tim Pace
text: Wow......I can't believe we haven't been here sooner. Come for the pizza, stay for the chicken üòç. Very clean and well-managed.

name: Jessica Peterson Scoles
text: The food was mediocre at best and staff seemed either bored or a bit annoyed. Definitely overpriced for the value.

name: Nicholas Guerrieri
text:
!!!GO FOR THE WONDERFUL FRIED CHICKEN!!
- Even though Pizza Ranch is new in town, I have quickly fallen in love with this buffet restaurant! ‚Ä¶More

name: Barbara
text: It‚Äôs a buffet style pizza restaurant that also has another buffet table with chicken, potatoes, salad, etc... It is family friendly, and has pleasantly colored walls/decor.  I would normally not give a buffet 5 stars, but this one deserved ‚Ä¶More

name: david james
text: Great place and seemed family friendly

name: Melinda Walker
text: Food and service were both great!

name: Adam Gilson
text: Had a good selection of everything on the buffet line even though they where not busy when we first got there.

name: Rita Deal
text: Great food, clean atmosphere and everyone was friendly ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

name: LLona Wade
text: We love this place! They have pizza but much to r surprise they have an amazing Sunday chicken dinner every day on the buffet. Dessert pizzas, ice cream, and service is outstanding!!!!

name: Stella Lasker
text: Awesome place. Great food.

name: becky fields
text: It didn't have a very good selection of pizza or regular food, what they did have was good and hot

name: Rob Fisk
text: For three people, $45. We can get 2 DELICIOUS pizzas from Marcos for $25. The pizzas were lame. Don't plan on ever spending my money there again.

name: Jordan M.
text: It was pretty busy, but the staff was getting everyone in as fast as they could. The food was good and was always hot/fresh. I will definitely be coming back here!!!

name: Austin Crook
text: Went with a party of six. Had a food bar, including some good southern food, pizza buffet by request, awesome desserts and excellent staff. It was packed on a Monday and they were keeping up no problem. A great birthday dinner and would recommend to anyone.

name: Ruth Wheeler
text: The best thing is the creamy ice cream and the chicken is awesome

name: Dumb
text: The food was okay and the service was good. But it was nothing to go head over tail about. Over all it was good. Maybe the longer it is open it will get better.

text: Awesome food and people are sooo friendly

name: Renee Howard
text: Good place to eat..good food :)

name: Matt Sindle
text: I wouldn't eat here again.  I found a rather large moth in the salad and when I brought it to the manager I got a smile and "oh sorry about that" and she took my plate.  I should also note they left the rest of the salad that was mixed in with the moth on the buffet for everyone to eat and didn't pull it...

name: Josh Davis
text: Pizza Ranch allowed us to use their room for an event.  They were very hospitable!!  I will definitely be using Pizza Ranch for all of my events in Conway!

name: Debi House
text: Pizza is good.  Chicken is addictive.

name: Shane H
text: They have a nice food bar with lots of pizza choices. I discovered the fresh fried chicken and it was really good. The manager helps you any way he can and the staff are really friendly and helpful too.

name: Ashleigh Kelley
text: Not impressed! The chicken and spinach/feta/craisin/walnut salad were very good but that's about it. The worst part was the atmosphere. It's Western themed but the music was straight out of a doctor's office.

name: Pam Price
text: Very good!  People were friendly.  Clean.

text: Fast friendly and servers stay on top of keeping your table clear of plates. If they Dont have the pizza you want on the Buffett table then ask and they will proudly make it for you. Sports fans they have the game one of several tvs hanging ‚Ä¶More

text: I didn't think to take pictures. My dad took us here and paid for us to eat lunch with him real quick before a meeting. He loves the place but I must just not be used to it... For 3 people it was over 40 dollars... Which isn't unusual at ‚Ä¶More

text: Soft serve is wonderful, eat desert first! Fried Chicken is pretty tasty and they have pizza too! They will custom make pizza for you and they did for us. I hate to say this, but it is the Golden Corral of pizza.

text: We went around 2pm and pizza buffet couldnt be kept up with. The sweet pizzas especially were gone in no time. Maybe consider expanded the buffet at peak times.  High chairs are really good for the kids as they arent huge. Pizza and other ‚Ä¶More

text:
Pizza Ranch in Conway Dave ward exit go west about a mile over bridge on t he left buffet pizza and chicken with salad bar  great fresh take on pizza
Great chicken few veggies. All you can eat.
